articles.title: Agreement on Establishing Friendship City Relations Signed between Cities of DPRK and Nepal
articles.content:
Agreement on Establishing Friendship City Relations Signed between Cities of DPRK and Nepal
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- An agreement on establishing the friendship city relations between Phyongsong City of the DPRK and Baktapur City of Nepal was signed in Nepal on July 19.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the friendship delegation of Phyongsong City headed by An Myong Ok, chairperson of the City People's Committee, the DPRK ambassador to Nepal and his embassy officials and from the Nepalese side were members of the leadership of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party including Chairman Narayan Man Bijukchhe, the administrator of the city, personages from all walks of life and citizens.

articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian President
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the July 23 revolution, the auspicious holiday of the Egyptian people.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the friendly Egyptian people bigger progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian PM
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Ibrahim Mahlab, prime minister of Egypt, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the July 23 revolution, the national day of Egypt.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Egypt bigger successes in their work for the country's security and economic development.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to his Egyptian counterpart Sameh Shoukry on the same day.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party headed by Raul Kroeff, member of its Central Committee, Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Brazilian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Brazilian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party headed by Raul Kroeff, member of its Central Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the  birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the noble life of Kim Il Sung, great sage of revolution and eternal sun of Juche, the visitors looked round historic relics preserved with much care. 
					
					 They went round historic relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that Kim Il Sung saved the destiny of the country and its people from the Japanese imperialist colonial rule and his birthplace Mangyongdae would always stand as a place dear to all people struggling to build a new free and just world.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Three-Revolution Exhibition House, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital and other places.

articles.title: Delegation of Juche Idea Study Organization Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Juche Idea Study Organization Here
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions led by General Secretary Mikhail Panchenko arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Major Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Major Industrial Establishments
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of major industrial establishments in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					 He learned in detail about the production of Juche fertilizer, vinalon and custom-built equipment at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex and held a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underscored the need to boost the production at the complexes associated with the giant footsteps of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It took measures to scrupulously manage equipment and improve their technical control so that the production might be kept at a high rate. It also called on the relevant units to satisfactorily provide raw and other materials needed for production at the complexes.
					
					 Going round the Hungnam Pharmaceutical Factory associated with leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, the premier underlined the need to continue dynamically pushing forward the project for modernizing the factory and boost the production of quality medicines so as to promote the people's health.

articles.title: Rainy Spell Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Rainy Spell Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A rainy spell has begun in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, with the seasonal rainy front coming from the northern area.
					 It is now raining in most areas of the country, except some areas of Kangwon Province, according to a weather expert. 
					
					 In general, a rainy spell in the country would start early in July with the rainy front coming from the southern area.
					
					 But, the rainy season for this year began later than usual, which is recorded as the fourth late rainy spell since 1982.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Football School
articles.content:
Wyongyang Int'l Football School
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- It is one year since the Pyongyang International Football School, built on scenic Rungna Islet in Pyongyang, began its operation.
					 In the period the school improved its educational and living environment.
					
					 A geothermal heating system was introduced, with more advanced educational equipment and apparatuses supplemented. Dietary meals are served to the schoolers in keeping with their ages and physical and health conditions.
					
					 Educational subjects and hours were instituted to suit the features of a professional sports school. Its instructors are winners of the title of Merited Athlete or experienced persons with coach career.
					
					 The school, divided into primary, junior and senior classes, has paid big efforts to raising its enrollees' command of foreign languages and deepening their knowledge of mathematics. Meanwhile, its students have striven to acquire advanced football techniques on the basis of analysis into international matches.
					
					 The school took the title at the soccer tournament of the 51st National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools.
					
					 Making debut at the 3rd International Children's Invitation Football Tournament held in China this March, the school teams (U-11, U-13) won two trophies and the titles of best player and top scorer.
					
					 Principal Hyon Chol Yun told KCNA that school would do its best to raise the country's football to the world's level.

articles.title: Sports Contests to Be Held on War Victory Day in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Contests to Be Held on War Victory Day in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Various sports contests will take place in the DPRK to mark the 61st anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950 - July 27, 1953).
					 A swimming contest of officials from commissions, ministries and national institutions is to start at the Changgwang Health Complex in Pyongyang on July 28. The contest will be held in individual and team events, divided into four groups.
					
					 A national Taekwon-Do all-star tournament for Jonsung Cup will run in Hamhung City on July 29-August 4. The tournament, to be attended by senior first-division players, will select a top player in sparring event.
					
					 A national Paduk (go) contest, to be held divided into individual, team and mixed double events, will take place on a group round-robin and knockout basis.
					
					 Meanwhile, a selection tournament for swimmers representing the city of Pyongyang is under way for the 40th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize.

articles.title: New Kind of Health Food Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Health Food Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Health Foodstuffs Institute under Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University developed a new kind of health food, a mixture of potato and soybean.
					 The health food is three times higher than rice in protein and fatty content and five to ten times higher in vitamin and mineral content.
					
					 Easily absorbable, it is considered good for preventing diabetes and hyperlipemia.
					
					 It can be taken as a staple food.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Commemorated
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Further Developing Educational Work".
					 The work published on July 22, Juche 73 (1984) deals with the essence of the socialist education, position of the educational work in socialist construction and importance of developing the educational work and indicates tasks and ways for improving the contents and methods of education and its quality and successfully training the younger generation as able and competent revolutionaries.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in a report that Kim Jong Il's work serves as an immortal militant banner to be firmly held aloft in renewing the understanding of the scientific accuracy, validity and vitality of the Juche-oriented and popular educational idea indicated by President Kim Il Sung in the theses on socialist education and reconfirming them and further developing the educational work.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Over the past three decades since the publication of the work the ideas and theories of the work have been successfully embodied and thus a revolutionary turn has taken place in the national education and the appearance of education undergone a dramatic change.
					
					 The Juche-oriented education of the DPRK greeted the period of fresh prosperity in its development thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has developed the universal compulsory eleven-year education system provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into the universal compulsory twelve-year education system.
					
					 He advanced the policy on educating all the people to be well versed in science and technology. This serves as precious guidelines for bringing about a fresh leap forward in developing the higher education of the country and training scientific and technological talents.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to bring about a fresh revolutionary turn in the educational work and thus make a positive contribution to building a highly-civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Wartime Drive for Increased Production
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Wartime Drive for Increased Production
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung directed great efforts to the wartime production during the Fatherland Liberation War and wisely led it, setting a shining example in the wartime production and the work to consolidate the rear in a  modern warfare.
					 The President aroused the whole party and all people to the struggle for wartime production under so hard conditions.
					
					 He made radio addresses to all the Korean people "Go All Out for Victory in the War" and  "Let Us Resolutely Repel the U.S. Imperialists' Armed Invasion" on  June 26 and July 8, Juche 39 (1950). He indicated the main orientation of wartime production --reorganizing all work into a wartime system and mobilizing manpower and resources in the northern half of Korea.
					
					 In various works, he also indicated the orientation and ways to push ahead with the wartime production and strengthen the work of supporting the front to bring earlier the victory in the war and wisely led the work for doing so.
					
					 He made sure that particularly great efforts were channeled into increasing the agricultural production in the wartime.
					
					 He also made sure that women increased their role and labor exchange teams and ox sharing teams were widely organized and operated to solve the most difficult labor issue in the rural areas.
					
					 The total grain output increased 13 percent in 1952 as against that in the previous year thanks to the wise leadership of the President and the patriotic enthusiasm of the peasants who turned out in the struggle with intense loyalty to the party and the leader. 
					
					 He wisely led the dynamic drive for ensuring wartime industrial production so that war supplies and daily necessities were provided to the front and the rear.
					
					 He paid a deep attention to the development of medium- and small-scale local industry and saw to it that local industrial factories were preserved and expanded and producers' cooperatives organized in different parts of the country.
					
					 Thanks to the workers' devoted struggle, production of munitions including weapons and ammunitions to be sent to  the front showed a sharp increase and overall production jumped five and six times as compared with that in the year before the outbreak of the war.
					
					 He gave field guidance to many factories and enterprises despite a hail of bullets and shells during the days of the war, encouraging the producers to boost the munitions production.
					
					 His energetic leadership served as a powerful engine instilling into the Korean people conviction in the victory in the war and inspiring them to win a great victory in the decisive battle with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: DPRK's Right to Self-defence Is Inviolable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Right to Self-defence Is Inviolable: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The field of the national defense industry of the DPRK has recently achieved such landmark success as developing ultra-precision and high-performance tactical guided weapons in a short span of time and successfully test-fired them.
					 Strategic force units and other units of the ground, naval, air and anti-air forces of the Korean People's Army (KPA) are, therefore, taking one measure after another to bolster up the nation's capability for self-defence such as the ultra-precision tactical rocket firing and the drills for firing artillery pieces with various missions.
					
					 As a result, the KPA has a master key to putting short-, medium- and long-range guided weapons and all other strike means on a world's ultra-precision level and a bright prospect for maximizing the rate of hits and their performance.
					
					 The U.S. and other undesirable forces such as the Park Geun Hye group in south Korea are displeased with these achievements.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies termed the DPRK's tactical rocket firing a "violation of the resolutions" of the UN Security Council and the routine military drills of the KPA a "politically-motivated low-profile provocation" and "sustained military threat to allies in the region" in a bid to galvanize the international public opinion.
					
					 It is illogical for the U.S. to find fault with the tactical rockets of the DPRK, a product of its industry for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK's consistent policy for bolstering the capabilities for national defence including the development of tactical rockets is an inevitable option due to the prevailing grim situation caused by the hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 While pulling up the DPRK over its drills for firing tactical rockets and shells with various missions, the U.S. is staging joint naval exercises with the south Korean puppet forces in the South and East seas of Korea and large-scale joint naval maneuvers in the waters off Jeju Island with nuclear carrier George Washington strike flotilla and group of Aegis destroyer Kidd involved.
					
					 It is the truth of history that aggressors coming in attack with nuclear weapons should be countered with nukes only.
					
					 Nuclear forces for self-defence are the most powerful means for settling accounts with hostile forces resorting to high-handed and arbitrary practices and posing nuclear threats and for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 It is thanks to the deterrence for self-defence which the DPRK has bolstered up to cope with the ever-more undisguised aggression war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces that peace has been preserved on the Korean peninsula, one of the world's hotspots.
					
					 But for that, a nuclear war would have broken out on the peninsula long ago.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces are making desperate efforts to eliminate the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK at any cost while finding fault with it. This clearly proves that nuclear deterrence is the best means for defence which ensures a peaceful environment and stable conditions for the development and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 The DPRK's measures for bolstering military capabilities, its legitimate right to self-defence, including the firing of tactical rockets, building of nuclear force and military exercises will remain unchanged no matter what others may say and no matter how the situation may change.
					
					 The U.S. and the hostile forces should not miscalculate.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Dismisses U.S. Fiction about DPRK's Proliferation of WMDs
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Dismisses U.S. Fiction about DPRK's Proliferation of WMDs
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The assistant secretary for International Security and Nonproliferation of the U.S. Department of State recently expressed concern over the possible proliferation of weapons of mass destruction (WMD) by north Korea. This is nothing but a cock-and-bull story.
					 The U.S. has neither face nor justification to talk about someone's "proliferation of weapons." 
					
					 Last year it staged nuclear war exercises in south Korea, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase and, availing itself of this opportunity, signed contracts on selling weapons worth a colossal amount of dollars to the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 This year it is also mulling secretly introducing THAAD worth astronomical figures of funds to the puppet forces. It rammed through Congress a bill on the export of warships to Taiwan.
					
					 The U.S. tops the world's list of arms sale.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. is the world's biggest proliferator of WMDs and arms dealer.
					
					 The aim sought by it through arms sale is to rake up profits and spark off arms race and escalate regional disputes and thus create political, military and economic phases favorable for world domination.
					
					 It is for this reason that it has been keen on selling WMDs and has turned blind eyes to the arms sale by its allies who will play the role of a shock brigade in realizing its ambition for domination.
					
					 The U.S. arms sale has pushed the situation in Northeast Asia including the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 Innocent people are shedding blood at the hands of terrorists armed with American weapons in many regions of the world including Iraq and Palestine.
					
					 It is a height of impudence and double standards for the U.S. to find fault with those countries not obedient to it and spread the story about "proliferation of WMD" although it is committing indelible crimes against the world and humankind through the criminal arms sale.
					
					 By ratcheting the tension through spread of such fictions as "proliferation of WMDs by north Korea", the U.S. seeks to cover up its wild ambition for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 But it is seriously mistaken.
					
					 The world is now jeering and censuring the U.S. as it behaves like a guilty party filing a suit first while spreading the above-said story.
					
					 The U.S. had better repent of its crimes against humanity before finding fault with others.
					
					 It should behave with discretion, bearing in mind that its attempts to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK through the shameless application of double standards will only bring into bolder relief the absurdity of its despicable policy of hostility toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules War Hysteria of S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules War Hysteria of S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Han Min Gu, puppet minister of defense of south Korea, recently blustered that south Korea would strike the base of provocation, support and commanding forces, talking about the "provocation by the north". He even talked rubbish that if the north provokes again, it will have to be aware of the danger to "the existence of its social system". He slandered the DPRK's efforts for mending the north-south relations, terming them "typical camouflaged peace offensive".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What he uttered is as crazy as gambling over the fate of the south Korean people.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now the north-south relations remain tenser than ever before. 
					
					 No one can vouch that an all-out war would not break out due to the behavior of such ignorant guys as Han at a crucial time when the way will be paved for repairing the north-south relations or not. 
					
					 The puppet military war maniacs are openly kicking up war hysteria in a bid to chill the unanimous desire of all Koreans for improved north-south relations, national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification. They are nothing but a group of traitors and war servants of outside forces utterly indifferent to the security and interests of the nation. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK regard such betes noires as Han Min Gu who grew up on the bread given by outside forces as no more than dregs of society. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should properly understand the strong will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to ferret out and wipe out whoever tries to hurt the inviolable social system wherever he or she is in hiding and win the final victory. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will make those who challenge the dignified system of the DPRK through their malignant tongue-lashing keenly realize what a true war is like.

articles.title: U.S. Cannot Browbeat DPRK with "Gunboat Diplomacy": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Cannot Browbeat DPRK with "Gunboat Diplomacy": Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. war hysteria is an open challenge to the sincere efforts of the DPRK to defuse tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula, and an act of disturbing peace, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The U.S. thinks it can keep a hegemonic position in the Asia-Pacific region only when it puts the Korean peninsula and its vicinity under its control, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 To this end it is foolishly scheming to browbeat the DPRK with modern day "gunboat diplomacy" the keynote of which is nuclear threat and military blackmail.
					
					 To look back on history, Korea was subject to disgrace of a ruined nation due the "gunboat diplomacy" of foreign forces. Many countries of the world had their sovereignty ruthlessly violated by the "gunboat diplomacy" of the U.S. and other big Western powers.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently resorting to nuclear threat and blackmail, regarding the "gunboat diplomacy" as an invariable method to bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to know well that gone are the days never to return when it could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK to react to the U.S. nuclear threat with a powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The more recklessly the U.S. resorts to nuclear threat and blackmail, the further the DPRK will bolster up its nuclear armed force for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand it can never browbeat the DPRK with modern day "gunboat diplomacy" and go home at an early date, carrying with it huge nuclear armed forces in south Korea.

articles.title: Imperialists Have No Qualifications to Talk about Human Rights: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Imperialists Have No Qualifications to Talk about Human Rights: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Confrontation and contradiction among countries are getting so serious over the human rights issue that they are spilling over into military conflicts. The imperialists are to blame for these situations. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					 By origin, they have neither qualifications nor face to talk about human rights, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "human rights" touted by them are nothing but a watchword to realize their strategy for world domination. They are regarding the "human rights issue" as a lever for undisguised encroachment upon sovereignty of other countries and interference in their internal affairs.
					
					 They are interfering in internal affairs of other countries under the pretext of "defending human rights". Their tentacles are being stretched to all fields from state politics to social life.
					
					 They are trying to bring down even the social systems of other countries under the pretext of the "human rights issue". Anti-imperialist independent countries are the main targets of the imperialists' interference.
					
					 Their double-dealing attitude over the human rights issue is aimed to politicize the "human rights issue" of the relevant countries and mobilize their followers to put international pressure on them in a bid to achieve regime change.
					
					 They are regarding the "human rights issue" as a lever for political pressure and a pretext for sanctions and blockade in order to attain their purposes. They are also zealously helping those undesirable elements discontented with the social systems of the relevant countries and encouraging them in activities against their governments under the pretext of "defending human rights".
					
					 With no rhetoric can the imperialists justify or conceal the hypocritical and aggressive nature of their talk about "human rights".

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Armed Force for Self-Defence Will Become More Elite One: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Armed Force for Self-Defence Will Become More Elite One: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. suddenly let the flotilla of nuclear aircraft carrier George Washington enter Pusan Port of south Korea on July 11 under the pretext of joint military exercises with the south Korean military warmongers. On the same day it introduced the group of Aegis destroyer Kidd belonging to the U.S. Third Fleet into Tonghae Port of south Korea.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. introduced nuclear aircraft carrier and other war hardware into south Korea and are staging joint naval drills against the DPRK in the South and East seas of Korea, dangerous military provocations threatening peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 When there is a sign of reconciliation, the U.S. freezes it and when there is a sign of detente, it screws up the situation. This is the U.S. method for putting the situation on the Korean peninsula under its control.
					
					 The U.S. has handled the situation on the peninsula by such method for the past decades and it is trying to do so in the future, too.
					
					 Whenever it feels the need to attain its political and military purposes in its policy towards the DPRK, the U.S. is keen to frighten or threaten the army and people of the DPRK by introducing nuclear strike means.
					
					 It is the U.S. Korea strategy at present to stifle the DPRK by threatening it by force, economically blockading it and isolating it diplomatically.
					
					 The DPRK is left with no option but to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is time. The DPRK's nuclear armed force for self-defence will be further bolstered up and become a more elite one with each passing day.
					
					 Time will prove that the situation will never develop as desired by the U.S.

articles.title: Peace and Security on Korean Peninsula Are Guaranteed by DPRK's Powerful Military Deterrent: Papers
articles.content:
Peace and Security on Korean Peninsula Are Guaranteed by DPRK's Powerful Military Deterrent: Papers
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Under the prevailing situation where the U.S. and forces hostile towards the DPRK have become evermore undisguised in their challenge for aggression, the peace and security on the Korean peninsula are guaranteed by the DPRK's powerful military deterrent, say newspapers here Tuesday.
					 It is the consistent line and policy of the DPRK to bolster up the military capability for self-defence in every way and no one has the right to say this or that about it, says Rodong Sinmun in an article.
					
					 The DPRK's measure to bolster up its military capability is a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence to protect the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 The DPRK values the dignity and sovereignty as its life and soul and will never pardon anyone who infringes upon them.
					
					 The DPRK's measures to bolster up its military capability serve as a powerful means to firmly guarantee the peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 Peace can be preserved only when one is strong enough to prevent anyone from attacking one. It is guaranteed by one's own force.
					
					 We had already adopted the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as a strategic line and solemnly clarified it internally and externally.
					
					 The tremendous self-defence capability built by the DPRK is neither something to be bartered for U.S. dollars nor a political bargaining chip to be put on the negotiating table with hostile forces seeking to disarm the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's self-defence capability is like the precious life of the nation which can not be bartered for anything and the eternal wealth common to the nation as it guarantees the prosperity of a reunified country.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article says that no matter how the situation may change and what challenges it may face, the DPRK will bolster up its deterrent for self-defence in every way, defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and preserve the peace on the peninsula by its own efforts.

articles.title: Mammoth Rally Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Mammoth Rally Held in Seoul
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea held an all-people rally at Seoul Square on July 19 demanding the institution of a special law for probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 It was attended by bereaved families of victims of the disaster and people from all walks of life from Jeju Island, Pusan, Kwangju and other parts of south Korea, more than 15 000 in all.
					
					 Speakers said at the rally that the bereaved families proposed a special bill for probing the truth but it has not yet been discussed.
					
					 Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" have not moved at all because they should be investigated if the bill is made a law, they charged. They called for making every effort to have the special bill carried.
					
					 Chongwadae and the ruling party should be forced to yield to the people's demand in order to prevent the recurrence of the tragedy of the ferry Sewol, they declared.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demo in demand of the institution of the special law.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Slammed for Barring Special Law on Ferry Sewol Disaster from Being Instituted
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Slammed for Barring Special Law on Ferry Sewol Disaster from Being Instituted
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea denounced a conservative for barring a special law on the ferry sinking accident from being instituted, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo on Monday. 
					 The organization recalled that Sim Jae Chol, a lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party", posted on his website an article opposing the institution of a special law on the ferry sinking accident on July 20. 
					
					 This means his denial of the "government's" responsibility for the accident, it said, and went on:
					
					 The "government" and the "National Assembly" said they would institute a special law on the ferry sinking accident, but they are deceiving the people. 
					
					 The organization expressed the indignation at the fact that they are delaying the adoption of a special law, turning their faces away from the demand of the bereaved families for probing the truth about the ferry sinking accident. 
					
					 It demanded Sim Jae Chol immediately resign as he is turning his face away from the demand of the people as chairman of the ad hoc committee for state investigation of the "National Assembly" for probing the truth behind the ferry sinking accident.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Disregarding Deaths of Workers
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Disregarding Deaths of Workers
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of Builders of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul to denounce the authorities for disregarding the deaths of workers due to the labor accidents, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People. 
					 Speakers at the press conference said that the construction sites claiming more than two lives of workers in a day due to labor accidents are little different from the ferry Sewol. 
					
					 However, the irresponsible attitude of the "government" remains unchanged and the bill to punish the chief culprits of the labor accidents is still shelved at the "National Assembly", they said, adding:
					
					 Workers demanded various measures for safety at construction sites, but the authorities refused to take them.
					
					 It was disclosed that the incompetent bureaucrats have no will to protect vital rights and safety of people. 
					
					 The speakers declared they would launch an indefinite general strike to have the situation settled.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop All Military Cooperation with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop All Military Cooperation with Japan
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Movement for Reunified Korean Nation in south Korea made public a commentary on Monday in protest against joint military exercises with Japan.
					 The military authorities have chosen the road of staging joint military exercises with the naval forces of Japan led by a U.S. nuclear aircraft carrier, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 This supports Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", making it hard to prevent the "Self-Defense Forces" from advancing into the Korean peninsula.
					
					 This is also an act of chilling the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Urging the authorities to clarify their stand of opposing the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", the commentary demanded them stop all military cooperation with Japan as it encourages Japan in the revival of militarism.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Policy of Opening Rice Market Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Policy of Opening Rice Market Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Pusan and South Kyongsang Provincial Federation and the South Kyongsang Provincial Peasants Solidarity under the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea held a press conference outside the South Kyongsang Provincial Office on Monday at which they strongly protested the authorities' moves for totally opening rice market, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People. 
					 The organizations denounced the authorities for deciding to open rice market, saying that the total opening of rice market will lead to collapse of agriculture. 
					
					 They demanded the authorities immediately withdraw the arbitrary policy of opening rice market. 
					
					 They declared that they would call the authorities to account for self-righteous acts and fight it out to defend food sovereignty. 
					
					 As they tried to stage a tent strike the police blocked the setting up of tents. Enraged at this, the organizations said they would rebuild tents and launch a long-term strike in protest against the authorities' policy of opening rice market.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Sri Lanka, South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Sri Lanka, South Africa
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held in Sri Lanka on July 5 and a lecture was given in South Africa on July 11 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the feats of the President and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The events were attended by figures and people from all walks of life in those countries.
					
					 W. A. Duminduwardane, director of Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea who is also chairman of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka, said in a speech that though the President passed away, the world progressives revere him as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, noted that the President fathered the great Juche idea and the Songun idea and performed the great feats on behalf of the country and its people and revolution with his tireless leadership.
					
					 He said that the feats performed by the President for mankind would go down in history.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups and aired special programs on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise,
					 The Indonesian paper Republika on July 6 carried an article titled "20 anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung" praising the career of the peerless great man who performed undying feats on behalf of the times and history with his outstanding idea and theories and great revolutionary practice.
					
					 The paper said that the President was the most prominent leader representing the 20th century, a peerless great man and a great sage of mankind, adding that though he passed away, his idea and cause are given steady continuity.
					
					 On the same day, the Zimbabwean paper The Herald in an article titled "In memory of President Kim Il Sung century after century" dealt with the ideological and theoretical feats of the President and his feats in building the party, army and state.
					
					 Guinean domestic and international and seven-language broadcasting services on July 8 broadcasted programs saying that the President was a peerless elder statesman revered by the world people for his personality as a great man.
					
					 On the same day, Equatorial Guinea TV broadcasted a program showing photos of the President and dealing with his revolutionary career and feats.
					
					 Myanmar TV aired the Korean film "Pyongyang Today" on July 9.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Angola, Nigeria
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Angola, Nigeria
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and film shows took place in Angola and Nigeria from June 25 to July 11 on the occasion of the July 25-June 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present at the events were service personnel of the Presidential Guard Unit of Angola and other units under it, personages of various circles in Nigeria and masses.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Provoker of Korean War".

articles.title: Firmado acuerdo de hermanamiento entre ciudades de Corea y Nepal
articles.content:
Firmado acuerdo de hermanamiento entre ciudades de Corea y Nepal
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 19 en Nepal el acuerdo de hermanamiento entre la ciudad de Phyongsong de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la de Baktapur de Nepal.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion de amistad de la ciudad de Phyongsong encabezada por la presidenta del Comite Popular An Myong Ok, el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en este pais, y por la nepalesa el presidente  Narayan Man Bijukchhe y miembros de la Direccion del Comite Central del Partido Obrero y Campesino de Nepal, el administrador de la ciudad de Baktapur, personalidades de distintos estratos y ciudadanos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente egipcio
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este martes un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, con motivo del 62o aniversario de la Revolucion del 23 de Julio, fiesta jubilosa del pueblo egipcio.
					El remitente expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose tambien en lo adelante y deseo de todo corazon mayor progreso y prosperidad al amistoso pueblo egipcio.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre fábricas y empresas de ciudad de Hamhung
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre fábricas y empresas de ciudad de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrió varias fábricas y empresas importantes de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					En el Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, el Complejo de Vinalón "8 de Febrero" y el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, analizó en detalles el estado de producción de abono y vinalón Juche y los equipos y convocó reunión de consulta.
					
					Subrayó allí la necesidad de aumentar la producción en los complejos en que están impregnadas las nobles huellas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para organizar con escrupulosidad el cuidado de equipo y la administración técnica para normalizar en alto nivel la producción y hacer suministrar suficientemente a las unidades relacionadas las materias primas y los materiales necesarios a la producción de las empresas.
					
					Recorriendo la Fábrica Farmacéutica de Hungnam donde están impregnadas las hazañas de dirección del Dirigente, el premier exhortó a seguir impulsando la obra de modernización de la fábrica y producir muchas medicinas de buena calidad a ser contribuidas al fomento de salud del pueblo.

articles.title: Comienzan lluvias continuas en RPDC
articles.content:
Comienzan lluvias continuas en RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea comienzan las lluvias constantes por la influencia del frente de lluvias. 
					Segun un meteorologico, ahora caen lluvias casi en todas las regiones excepto una parte de la provincia de Kangwon. 
					
					En general, las lluvias continuas comienzan desde la parte sur por el movimiento del frente de lluvias hacia el norte, pero este ano se inician al reves. 
					
					En 1982, 1999 y 2000 se iniciaron en Corea las lluvias prolongadas fuera de la temporada despues del 20 de julio. 
					
					Este ano es la cuarta vez.

articles.title: Cumple un ano la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Cumple un ano la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Paso un ano desde que se abriera la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang construida en el capitalino islote Rungna.
					Durante un ano pasado, se mejoraron las condiciones de ensenanza y vida.
					
					Fueron instalados los equipos geotermicos de calefaccion y suplementadas modernas instalaciones de ensenanza.
					
					Suministran a los alumnos los alimentos sabrosos y nutritivos conforme a sus edades, constituciones fisicas, estados de salud, etc.
					
					Fueron instituidos las asignaturas y el horario adecuados a la escuela de futbol y es tipico el metodo de ensenanza y educacion.
					
					Fueron seleccionados como maestros los deportistas benemeritos y los entrenadores que obtuvieron muchas experiencias en las competencias nacionales e internacionales.
					
					La escuela tiene el grupo primario, el secundario basico y el secundario superior. El nivel general de conocimientos de los alumnos es muy alto, sobre todo, en lengua extranjera y matematica.
					
					En la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos, los alumnos analizan los juegos internacionales y aprenden avanzados movimientos de futbol.
					
					Ellos lograron buenos resultados en la 51a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de las Escuelas Deportivas de Jovenes y Ninos.
					
					Ellos participaron por primera vez en el III torneo internacional por invitacion de futbol infantil Codion, efectuado en marzo pasado en China, integrando los equipos sub-11 y sub-13.
					
					En esa ocasion, obtuvieron 2 copas, el premio de mejor jugador y el de mejor goleador.
					
					El director de la escuela Hyon Chol Yun dijo a la ACNC que formara bien a los ninos talentosos de futbol y contribuira a desarrollar el futbol coreano al nivel mundial.

articles.title: Es invariable el derecho a la autodefensa de la RPDC, reafirma ACNC
articles.content:
Es invariable el derecho a la autodefensa de la RPDC, reafirma ACNC
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El sector de la industria de defensa nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desarrollo en un corto plazo el sistema superpreciso de armas teledirigidas tacticas y realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba. 
					A base de ello, las fuerzas estrategicas y las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea toman sucesivamente las medidas para fortalecer la capacidad de autodefensa nacional incluso el lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos superprecisos y los ejercicios de artilleria de distintas misiones. 
					
					El EPC tiene la llave para desarrollar en nivel mundial y con alta precision las armas teledirigidas de corto, mediano y largo alcance y otros medios de ataque y elevar al maximo la efectividad y el poderio de ataque. 
					
					Esto no les agrada a EE.UU. y otras fuerzas seguidoras incluyendo la camarilla surcoreana de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y sus satelites califican el lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos de la RPDC de "violacion de resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y despiertan la opinion publica describiendo los ejercicios ordinarios del EPC como "provocacion de baja intensidad con fines politicos" y "sucesiva amenaza militar contra los paises aliados de la region".
					
					Es ilogica la censura de EE.UU. a los cohetes tacticos de la RPDC, fruto de la industria de autodefensa nacional. 
					
					La invariable politica de la RPDC en materia del fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional incluso el desarrollo de cohetes tacticos es la opcion inevitable al juzgar la severa realidad de hoy generada por la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. introduce el colectivo de portaaviones nuclear George Washington y la escuadrilla de buque Aegis Kid desarrollando en los mares Sur y Este de Corea los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos con los titeres surcoreanos y planea librar otro simulacro maritimo conjunto de gran envergadura en las aguas cercanas de la isla Jeju. 
					
					Hay que responder con armas nucleares a las fuerzas agresoras que esgrimen las armas nucleares. Esto es la verdad de la historia. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa resultan el medio mas poderoso para saldar cuenta final con las fuerzas hostiles que recurren al despotismo, las arbitrariedades y la amenaza nuclear, y defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion. 
					
					Hasta la fecha se ha preservado la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente e inestable, gracias a la RPDC que vino consolidando el disuasivo de autodefensa frente a las cada dia mas siniestras maniobras de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Si no hubiera el disuasivo autodefensivo de la RPDC, ya se habria desatado la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana se desesperan por eliminar el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC, lo cual evidencia que el disuasivo nuclear es el maximo remedio de defensa para asegurar el ambiente pacifico y las condiciones estables para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y nacion. 
					
					EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles deben tener presente que seran invariables muestras justas medidas de fortalecimiento de la capacidad militar incluso el lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos, la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares y los ejercicios militares.

articles.title: ACNC comenta disparates de funcionario de Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta disparates de funcionario de Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el asistente del secretario para Seguridad Internacional y No Proliferacion del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos disparateo que "se preocupa de la posibilidad de proliferacion de las armas de exterminio masivo del Norte de Corea".
					EE.UU. es el Estado criminal sin honra ni justificacion para cuestionar la "proliferacion de armas" de alguien.
					
					El ano pasado, llevo a la peor fase la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana con los ejercicios belicos nucleares y aprovechando esta oportunidad, concerto contratos de fondos fabulosos sobre la venta de armas a los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Este ano tambien pretende exportar secretamente el sistema de interceptacion de misiles THAAD de valor astronomico a los titeres surcoreanos y aprobo hasta el proyecto de ley sobre la exportacion del buque de guerra a Taiwan.
					
					En tales circunstancias, la suma total de exportacion de armas de EE.UU. ocupa el primer lugar del mundo.
					
					Esto comprueba que el imperio es el mayor culpable de proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo en escala mundial y el comerciante de armas no. 1.
					
					EE.UU. intenta crear la fase politica, militar y economica favorable a la heguemonia mundial al ganar dinero a traves de exportacion de armas, causar la carrera armamentista y agravar el conflicto regional.
					
					Por esta razon, hace vista gorda de la exportacion de armas por parte de sus lacayos que cumplen en la delantera la ambicion norteamericana de dominar el mundo.
					
					Hoy en dia, la situacion regional del Nordeste Asiatico, incluyendo la Peninsula Coreana, esta a punto del estallido de guerra nuclear.
					
					En Irak, Palestina y otras zonas del mundo el pueblo inocente derrama la sangre ahora tambien por los terroristas pertrechados con armas hechas en EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU., que cometio esos crimenes imperdonables ante el mundo y la humanidad, difunde el rumor de "proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo" cuestionando a los paises antiyanquis, lo cual es el climax de descaro y pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Pretende encubrir su malsana intencion dominacionista sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico creando la crisis como la "proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo del Norte de Corea".
					
					Pero, el mundo se burla y rechaza ese rumor falso de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. tiene que reflexionar primero de sus crimenes antieticos antes de cuestionar a alguien.
					
					Debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que si intenta manchar la imagen de la digna RPDC con la aplicacion de la descarada pauta de doble rasero, se revelara mas el caracter injusto de su politica hostil a ella.
